reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, beautiful, and lightweight, with one mentioning it pairs well with jeans.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fall must have
items.body: I love this lightweight fall sweater! It’s thin enough to layer but thick enough to wear alone on a cool fall day. The color is beautiful! The fit is nice not too tight or baggy. I also love how soft it is. Not scratchy as some have been before. A must have to a fall wardrobe! Read more
items.author: sacmom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, thin and classy athleisure ware!
items.body: What a lovely sweater and so soft! Very thin material so you shouldn’t get to hot! Athleisure ware is really in right now, so I paired it with a pair of side striped sweatpants that were also navy and blue! A nice casual outfit! Got it at a sale price and was totally worth the price!!! Read more
items.author: J. Orbeck

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Classy lightweight sweater
items.body: This is a great lightweight sweater. The cable texture gives it a very classy look. It can be worn to work and just as easily be worn with jeans. I am 5'7" and weigh 155lbs and bought a Med. It is very true to size, fitting like a loose sweater with a ribbed banded bottom and sleeves that are plenty long enough. I haven't washed it yet but if it keeps it's size and shape this sweater is a home run! Hmm...what color should I buy next? Read more
items.author: Barbs T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic sweater
items.body: My daughter loves the softness and fit!! Read more
items.author: Beth Lange

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Exactly as described. Cute, lightweight sweater. Love it. Fits as expected. Will buy again in other colors. Read more
items.author: Stephanie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very thin sweater.
items.body: Although I like this brand, this piece was probably meant for spring or summer. Also “stripes” ( knitted cable texture) are well done but material is too thin to pull it off. Well priced and good colors too. I would buy the lighter colors for spring and steer away from the autumn colors. Read more
items.author: D. Peters

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well
items.body: True to size, very soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: Lightweight but cozy and comfortable. Very nice for the office or weekends. The color is very pretty. I will definitely order it in another color. Read more
items.author: CAROL E.

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Classic White, Stripe-black, Stripe-blue, Apricot, Royal Blue, Black, Caramel, Coffee, Green, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
